#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
char a[100000000];
int main()
{
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test>0)
     {
        cout<<"\n";
 
        int sum=0,b=0;
        cin>>a;
        for(int i=0;a[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            sum+=a[i]-48;
            b=b*10+(a[i]-48);
        }
        sum=sum<<b;
        cout<<sum;
        test--;
     }
    return 0;
}
